item.title: Hello World
item.description: Today is a new day to think and do.

item.title: About Nate Gay
item.description: Nate is a senior software engineer at WP Engine, where he builds technology that connects people together. As a board member for Age Equity Alliance, he cares deeply about issues of equity and strives to empower organizations to value and create diverse teams. At work, Nate builds scalable systems using kubernetes and golang. He has lead three winning hackathon teams and has been recognized as a WP Engine Culture Award winner for contributions in leadership and technology.

item.title: Attributions
item.description: Thank you to all the creators who made this site possible. If I have underattributed or misattributed please open a github issue. This site is powered by Hugo. The theme is based off of hello-friend by panr. The rocket logo was created by the emojione project and was released under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 4.0 International license.
